name: final_project
description: Digitalization Plan for judicial offices software.

scripts.tests: yarn run compile:kotlin && java -cp out/production/final_project/:lib/junit-4.12.jar:lib/hamcrest-core-1.3.jar org.junit.runner.JUnitCore test.main.MainTest
